description.english: Take a shotgun in the trunk.
Deal damage to the boss in Space Oddity using deception.
description.russian: Нанесите боссу в Space Oddity урон обманным путём.

description.english: Tell Vince the story about the band.
Tell Vince about your work at the FBI.
description.russian: Расскажите Винсу историю о работе в ФБР.

displayName.english: Oh, How I Love Tea Parties.

description.russian: Суперстрелок: получите ранг S по стрельбе.

description.english: Enter the women's restroom at BSI.
description.russian: Зайти в женский туалет в BSI.

description.english: Eavesdrop on a dream about rabbits.
Dig a grave with your own name.

displayName.english: I See This in My Nightmares

description.english: Walk through the classroom more than 5 times.
Simon's father died when he was in school.
description.russian: Отец погиб, когда Саймон учился в школе.

description.english: Examine the portrait of the person who inspired you to become a game designer.
description.russian: Осмотрите портрет человека, который вдохновил вас стать игровым дизайнером.

description.english: Pass the shooting exam with an "A" or higher.
description.russian: Сдайте экзамен по стрельбе на оценку "А" или выше.

description.english: Help the girl find a job that will kill her.
description.russian: Помогите девушке найти работу, которая приведёт её к гибели.

description.english: Uncover the truth about the office worker's death.
Push the worker to their demise.

displayName.english: The Joker is the Strongest Card.

displayName.russian: Я больше не играю в азартные игры.

description.english: Take a photo with a corpse.
Take a picture with a corpse.
Pledge yourself to the Mad Magic.
Claim the reward for Mallak's death.
Reach the end of Spicy Calvados...
description.russian: Дойдите до конца в Spicy Calvados.

description.english: Aid Death in laying souls to rest.

description.russian: Сверните с пути мести в Spicy Calvados.

description.english: Find a reason to keep living.
Return to the game after a crash.

displayName.english: The Man Who Understood the World.

description.english: Try to take the sex toy.

displayName.english: Don't Forget to Water the Flowers...

description.english: Find the hidden flowers in the room.
Keep the maximum number of puppets alive until the end.
description.russian: Сохраните максимальное количество марионеток до конца игры.

description.english: Kill the Queen of Flesh with extreme cruelty.
description.russian: Убейте Королеву Плоти с особой жестокостью.

displayName.english: Die with Honor, Queen of Flesh.

description.english: Kill the Queen of Flesh with a single shot.
Kill Yak with a single shot.
Kill Klinton with a single shot.
Speak to all members of Anna's family.
description.russian: Поговорите со всеми членами семьи Анны.

description.english: Use the key to the heart.
Collect all secret weapons in the game.
description.russian: Соберите всё секретное оружие в игре.

description.english: Complete the Disturbing Horror Games challenge.
